overview: Ben is a control-freak, charmer, abuser and warped product of the digital age. He films everything. Jess is just out of rehab. Their worlds are dominated by each other.  Jess now needs some space and time apart from Ben and is invited by her friends to their house in the woods for the weekend.  People arrive and the party kicks off… but not everyone attending has been invited.
title: #Starvecrow
